SELECT t.id, t.order_id, t.voucher_id, t.vourche_code, t.state, t.openid, t.use_openid, u.head_img, u.nick_name, useuse.head_img as uhead_img, useuse.nick_name as unick_name, voucher.price, voucher.use_price, voucher.`name`, voucher.type, date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time, date_format(t.use_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as use_time FROM t_exp_decorate_user_voucher t LEFT JOIN t_exp_decorate_voucher voucher ON voucher.id=t.voucher_id LEFT JOIN t_exp_decorate_user u ON u.openid=t.openid LEFT JOIN t_exp_decorate_user useuse ON useuse.openid=t.use_openid WHERE 1 = 1
AND t.id=#{id}
